sentences.en: Can you extend your visit for a few days more?
sentences.cn: 你能把你的访问再延长几天 吗 ?

sentences.en: In this area , the plains extend for hundreds of li.
It might be possible to extend the technique to other crop plants.
sentences.cn: 也许可以将这种技术应用于其他农作物。

sentences.en: It was kind of you to extend an invitation to us.
Management have agreed to extend the deadline.
sentences.cn: 管理层已同意延长最后期限。

sentences.en: Our playing fields extend as far as those trees.
sentences.cn: 我们的操场延伸到那些树前.

sentences.en: Please extend the deadline a few days.
The bank will extend you credit.
sentences.cn: 银行会给你提供信用贷款.

sentences.en: The caves extend for some 18 kilo-metres.
The city council has decided to extend the road to the new town.
sentences.cn: 市政会已决定把公路延长到这个新市镇.

sentences.en: The food industry was given a green light to extend the use of these chemicals.
sentences.cn: 食品业获准继续使用这些化学品。

sentences.en: The main stem will extend to around 12ft, if left to develop naturally.
sentences.cn: 如果任其自然生长，主干可以长到约12英尺。

sentences.en: The vineyards of Anjou extend from west of Angers to up-river of Saumur.
sentences.cn: 安茹葡萄园从昂热西部一直延伸到索米尔的上游。

sentences.en: Theoretically, a line can extend into infinity.
sentences.cn: 从理论上来说直线可以无限地延伸.

sentences.en: This year they have introduced three new products to extend their range.
sentences.cn: 今年他们发布了3种新产品，以扩大产品范围。

sentences.en: We plan to extend the kitchen by six feet.
sentences.cn: 我们打算把厨房扩建六英尺。

sentences.en: While Onassis might clap a friend on the back, Niarchos would extend a businesslike hand.
sentences.cn: 奥纳西斯可能会拍拍朋友的后背，可尼亚尔霍斯却会公事公办地伸出手来。

words.tran_cn: 可延长的；可展开的；可扩张的
延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机

trans.tran_en: to continue for a longer period of time, or to make something last longer

trans.tran_cn: 延长， 延伸；提供， 给予
trans.tran_en: to continue for a longer period of time, or to make something last longer
